subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: Capacity development of national and regional authorities to elaborate, monitor, implement and report on gender-sensitive strategies/programmes/plans.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Ntnl gender capacity developed

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: Policy advice to harmonize legislative framework with Ukraine’s basic law and international obligations to ensure gender equality.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Policy advice provided

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description:
Output 1.1. The National Gender Machinery is developed and strengthened, international best practices included in national and regional plans/programmes of gender development.
- Provide expert assistance on review of the design of National Gender Machinery
- Support the activity of advisory groups for NGM development
- Hold ToTs for trainers of officials responsible for gender policy implementation through the system of capacity building institutions for state officials
- Hold capacity building trainings of national and regional officials responsible for gender policy implementation using cascade method through the system of capacity building institutions for state officials
- Provide support in reviewing regulatory acts in the sector of employment on compliance with equality of rights and opportunities of men and women in job and employment area
- Support participation in international networking and experience sharing for the state officials responsible for reporting on gender transformations
- Support the inclusions of gender knowledge and sensitivity as part of formal staff performance appraisal and in civil service exams
- Organise conference for two-way communication between CSOs, MPs and governmental officials in implementation of gender policy in Ukraine

Output 1.2. The system of monitoring of the execution of State Gender Equality Program to 2010 developed pursuant to the proposed recommendations:
- Assist in monitoring of the State and regional Gender Equality Programmes to 2010
- Hold review of the State and regional Gender Equality Programmes to 2010
Output 1.3. Capacity of state to deal with gender statistics built
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Gender machinery enhanced

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: Gender standards mainstreamed into the educational system (Implementation period:2008-2011). Support development of a pedagogical methodology on gender standards for teachers of secondary and high schools of Ukraine. Gender becomes part of teachers’ education, gender knowledge and gender sensitivity are integrated in the system of education. Build capacity of teachers in overcoming gender biases in education and integrating gender knowledge and gender sensitivity in the system of education of Ukraine. awareness of gender knowledge and gender sensitivity raised. Introduce gender sensitization events on gender education
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Education Free of Biases

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: Machinery for prevention and response to domestic violence in Ukraine assessed and the recommendations for its improvement elaborated (Implementation period:2008-2011). Assess current institutional framework for prevention and response to domestic violence in Ukraine. Hold round table basing on the analysis and recommendations above. Build capacity of district police inspectors and students of educational establishments for policemen of Ukraine on prevention of domestic violence. Build capacity of judges to deal with judicial cases involving domestic violence. 3Conduct gender sensitization events for judges on dealing with judicial cases involving domestic violence
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Response to GBV improved
